name: aipowered-helpdesk
description: AI powered help desk using Express and n8n

scripts.test: env -u http_proxy -u https_proxy -u HTTP_PROXY -u HTTPS_PROXY -u npm_config_http_proxy -u npm_config_https_proxy -u npm_config_proxy -u YARN_HTTP_PROXY -u YARN_HTTPS_PROXY sh -c 'for f in tests/*.test.js; do node "$f" || exit 1; done'
